dcterms:description: A dataset containing n-grams from a vast collection of digitized books, allowing for quantitative analysis of cultural trends over time.

dcterms:description: A comprehensive thesaurus that documents the historical meanings of English words, providing insights into their evolution over time.
dcterms:title: Historical Thesaurus of English (HTE)

dcterms:creator: Bryor Snefjella
Michel Généreux
Victor Kuperman
dcterms:description: A dataset providing historical ratings of concreteness for over 20,000 English words, useful for analyzing language evolution.
dcterms:title: Snefjella et al. (2019) dataset of historical concreteness ratings

dcterms:creator: William L Hamilton
Jure Leskovec
Dan Jurafsky
dcterms:description: A dataset of historical word embeddings that reveal patterns of semantic change over time.
dcterms:title: Historical embeddings by Hamilton et al. (2016)
